Give access to the apps on our EC2 instances

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: ALB access 8000 port of EC2 in Autoscaling Group

userData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash 
#
#
yum install -y git tmux 
sudo -u ec2-user -i <<'EOF'
curl "https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py" -o "get-pip.py"curl "https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py" -o "get-pip.py"
python3 get-pip.py
cd /home/ec2-user/
# aws s3 sync s3://monday-gs-999/app/ /home/ec2-user/app/ 
git clone https://github.com/kol999/ec2-flask.git
cd /home/ec2-user/ec2-flask
pip3 install -r requirements.txt 
python3 app.py
EOF
